description: “Noelia is a beautiful Puerto Rican pop singer and songwriter. She is the eldest daughter of Yolandita Monge, a famous international singer and actress. Showing her interest in music at a young age, Noelia eventually followed her mother’s footsteps and gained her own rights to fame respectively. She has sold more than 4 million albums worldwide, won multiple awards, and also won Latin Billboard’s Album of the Year.  This fabulous application is packed with entertainment! There is access to full tracks of Noelia’s popular songs, including the upbeat hit “Caribbean Queen Reloaded”, two full length music videos, a great assortment of wallpaper, and an exclusive link to connect with Noelia herself through Twitter.”
